## {pkgcheck}: Uso local

Instalaci칩n

```r
  options (repos = c (
    ropenscireviewtools = "https://ropensci-review-tools.r-universe.dev",
    CRAN = "https://cloud.r-project.org"
```

<br>

Ejemplo

```r

  resultados <- pkgcheck::pkgcheck(paquete)
```
